original: Bergh, Karl Werner Leonard, rektor, Motala Verkstad, f. 17/8/92 i Halmstad av försäkr :insp. Karl Gustav B. o. Anna Olsson. G. 17 m. Eli-da Konstantia Spångberg. Barn: Karl-Gustav Sigvard f. 18, Anna-Stina 22. — Folksk:lär:ex. i Gbg 15. Folk-sk :lär. 20, överlär. 23-44, rektor v. Motala s :ns yrkessk. 34-45, insp. f. samma sk. 31-33-, insp. f. Motala stads yrkessk. 31-45, rektor v. de nu fören. Motala yrkessk. sed. 46. Bibi. 23, led. av kommrfullm. 22-46, ordf. där 29-46, led. av komm:ndn 23-46, led. av ilokal-styr. f. östergötl. Ensk. Bank .sed. 44, dessutom led. av ett ant. ’styr. o. ndr. Medi. av Rotarykl. 45. Skr.: Lärobok i arbetskunskap f. fortsättn: skolor i anslutn. t. järnmanufaktur (23), Lärobok li bokför, f. fortsättn :’sk. i ansten. t. jordbruk (24). Hobbies: fotografering, mekanik.
translated: Bergh, Karl Werner Leonard, principal, Motala Verkstad, born 17/8/92 in Halmstad to insurance inspector Karl Gustav B. and Anna Olsson. Married for 17 years to Elida Konstantia Spångberg. Children: Karl-Gustav Sigvard born in 1918, Anna-Stina born in 1922. He completed his elementary school teaching certification in Gothenburg in 1915. He became an elementary school teacher in 1920, a head teacher from 1923-1944, a principal at Motala Vocational School from 1934-1945, an inspector for the same school from 1931-1933, an inspector for Motala City Vocational School from 1931-1945, and a principal at the now united Motala Vocational School since 1946. He was a member of the municipal council from 1922-1946 and served as chairman from 1929-1946. He was a member of the commission from 1923-1946 and a member of the local board for Ostergotland Savings Bank since 1944. In addition, he was a member of various boards and a media member of Rotary Club since 1945. He also authored books titled "Textbook in Work Art for Continuing Schools in Connection with Iron Manufacturing" in 1923 and "Textbook in Bookkeeping for Continuing Schools for Agriculture" in 1924. His hobbies include photography and mechanics.
